text: The University of Split is a public university in Split, Croatia. It was started in 1974. It mostly does science courses. As of 2009, a total of approximately 40,000 students have graduated, and 337 people have got doctoral degrees. == Faculties == * Faculty of Civil Engineering, Architecture and Geodesy * Faculty of Science * Faculty of Economics * Faculty of Law * Catholic Faculty of Theology * Faculty of Chemistry and Technology * Faculty of Medicine * Faculty of Kinesiology * Faculty of Maritime Studies * Faculty of Philosophy * Academy of Fine Arts * University Department of Professional Studies The Pharmacy course is run jointly by the Faculty of Medicine and the Faculty of Chemical Engineering. ==References== Category:1974 establishments in Europe Category:Colleges and universities in Croatia Category:Split
title: University of Split
